channel.title: Mystery Box (Project Insanity)

item.title: Mystery Box (Project Insanity)
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Make it like this: [code=java]
public static int mbox[] = {4151, 15439, 13734};
public static int mbox() {
return mbox[(int) (Math.random() * mbox.length)];
}

if(itemId == 3062) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(3062, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(mbox(), 1);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery Box (Project Insanity)
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

So I added strange box to my basic project insanity base (also known as mystery box in newer servers) and it does the right thing which is to output one of my three items, except sometimes it gives no item at all as a random <-- Itâ€™s not suppose to do that.

Code for strange box function:

if(itemId == 3062) { c.getItems().deleteItem(3062, 1); int[] arrayOfItems ={4151, 15439, 13734}; c.getItems().addItem(arrayOfItems[Misc.random(arrayOfItems.length)], 1); }

p.s. this is the old basic project insanity, i just added some new items.
